docs.title: About Me
docs.text: Chee-An Yu is a PhD student in multimedia commucation lab  (MCL) advised by Professor  C.-C. Jay Kuo in Electrical and Computer Engineering at the University of Southern California (USC). He received his bachelor’s degree in mechanical engineering and master’s degree in electrical engineering in 2018 and 2020, respectively, both from National Taiwan University. Before he started his PhD journey, he had been an algorithm design engineer for 2.5 years at Mediatek. His research interests are image and signal processing, machine learning, and electronic design automation. In his free time, he is a hiking enthusiast and basketball lover.

docs.title: Ph.D. in Electrical and Computer Engineering
Master in Electrical Engineering
docs.text:
• National Taiwan University (2018 ~ 2020)
  • Advanced Control Lab (Advisor: Li-Chen Fu)
  • Master Thesis: Complex Environment Localization Using Complementary Ceiling and Ground Information

docs.title: Publications
docs.text:
• GIFT: A Green Image Forgery Tracker: Jouranl of Visual Communication and Image Representation (under review)

  • Complex Environment Localization Using Complementary Ceiling and Ground Information: Journal of Autonomous Robots, 2023, 47.6:669-684

  • Multi-Layer Environmental Affordance Map for Robust Indoor Localization, Event Detection, and Social Friendly Navigation: IEEE/RSJ International Conference on Intelligent Robots and Systems (IROS 2019)

docs.title: Skills
docs.text:
• Programming Languages: Python, C/C++, Matlab
  • Image Signal Processing: Contrast Enhancement, Motion-blur Reduction, Noise Suppression
  • Machine Learning: Sustainable/Efficient AI, Green AI, Green Learning, Deep Learning
  • Electronic Design Automation: IR-drop analysis

docs.title: Engineer - Mediatek
docs.text:
Dates: 2020 Nov - 2023 Jun

  • Develop Motion deblur algorithm
  • Design panel compsenation algorithm
  • Analyze tone-mapping algorithm for contrast enhancement

docs.title: Robot Vision Internship - Techman Robot (Quanta Computer)
docs.text:
Dates: 2016 Jul ~ 2016 Aug

  • Build an embedding system to accelerate 3D data processing from depth camera
  • Develop depth image data processing algorithm

docs.title: Teaching Assistant
docs.text: • NTU Robotics (Adviser: Li-Chen Fu, 2019 Fall) Best TA reward

docs.title: See also
docs.text: VectorPro Project This is a reimplementation of the C++ vector by SunParis, offering faster performance than the standard C++ vector for operations such as Build, Insert, and Push.
